DOC.brief_summary: The Northern Shanghai Study is a prospective community-based study, which is aimed to investigate the prognostic factors, including conventional cardiovascular risk factors and asymptomatic target organ damage, for mortality and cardiovascular diseases, in 5,000 elderly Chinese.
DOC.brief_title: Prognosis in the Elderly Chinese: the Northern Shanghai Study
